strapiEvent.name: Arkansas Veteran's Village Golf Tournament
strapiEvent.description:
Arkansas Veterans Village, a local non-profit dedicated to providing transitional housing for military veterans, is thrilled to announce the 6th Annual Golf Tournament will be hosted at Paradise Valley Country Club on Sep 18.

  • Welcome Home: Since its establishment in 2016, Arkansas Veteran Village Corp. has successfully housed 95 veterans, with 18 currently being provided shelter. Proceeds from the golf tournament provide nearly one-third of the organization's annual budget, with 96% of all donations going directly toward transitional housing for homeless veterans.
  • Scramble Time: Gather your team of four and participate in the scramble format tournament. Prizes will be awarded for each flight, and a silent auction will be held to raise additional funds. There are also sponsorship and volunteer opportunities for those looking to join the cause!

Register your team today or sponsor the tournament HERE.
